scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend/Ubeers" "npm run start --prefix backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend/Ubeers && npm install
scripts.db:drop: psql -h localhost -U postgres -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS ubeers;'
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && psql -h localhost -U postgres -d ubeers -f ./backend/database/schema.sql
